comments:
JVEWRKB02:
in the testcase section on "Package rename"

There's an editor with a JFrame and an editor with a JPanel.  The JPanel is
added to the JFrame.  The JPanel is in a different project from the JFrame and
is in a package.

With both editors open, Refactor->Rename on the JPanel's package and change the
name.
Both editors are supposed to reload properly, but neither do... the canvas and
beans view remain blank.

The following exception shows up in .log:
